title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Skills: Social Dining Situations for Adolescents with Food Allergies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Food Allergy Management
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners accurately identify over 80% of risk factors related to food allergies in social dining situations
Learners can apply three or more communication strategies to effectively convey allergy information
Learners create and implement three types of allergy response manuals tailored to different dining environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
